page.title: 08HEALTH: COOKSTOWN CLINIC.
page.content: A FEW YEARS AGO A CENTRAL CLINIC WAS OPENED IN THE TOWN. THIS PROVIDES A VARIETY OF FACILITIES. THE LOCAL GENERAL PRACTITIONERS OPERATE FROM IT INSTEAD OF FROM THEIR PRIVATE HOMES,AS FORMERLY. THERE ARE SEVEN DOCTORS AND SIX NURSES. THE NURSES, WITH ADVICE FROM THE DOCTORS, OPERATE A TREATMENT ROOM WHERE MINOR INJURIES OR AILMENTS CAN BE LOOKED AFTER. ANYTHING MORE SERIOUS IS SENT ON TO THE CASUALTY DEPARTMENT OF THE HOSPITALS IN EITHER DUNGANNON OR MAGHERAFELT, BOTH TEN MILES AWAY. THERE IS ALSO A SECTION FOR TREATMENT OF EXPECTANT MOTHERS AND BABIES. SO FAR THERE IS NO DEPARTMENT FOR DISPENSING MEDICINES OR PRESCRIPTIONS. HOWEVER ONE OF THE MORE ENTERPRISING CHEMISTS IN THE TOWN HAS OPENED A BRANCH 100 METRES DOWN THE STREET.
